permafrost.tundra.math

Class ShortHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.math.ShortHelper

  • public final class ShortHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with shorts.

    • Field Summary

      private static short DEFAULT_SHORT_VALUE
      The default value used when parsing a null string.

        public static short parse(java.lang.String input)
        Parses the given string as an short.
        Parameters:
        input - A string to be parsed as short.
        Returns:
        Short representing the given string, or 0 if the given string was null.

      • parse

        public static short parse(java.lang.String input,
                          short defaultValue)
        Parses the given string as an short.
        Parameters:
        input - A string to be parsed as short.
        defaultValue - The value returned if the given string is null.
        Returns:
        Short representing the given string, or defaultValue if the given string is null.

      • parse

        public static short[] parse(java.lang.String[] input)
        Parses the given strings as shorts.
        Parameters:
        input - A list of strings to be parsed as integers.
        Returns:
        A list of shorts representing the given strings.

      • parse

        public static short[] parse(java.lang.String[] input,
                            short defaultValue)
        Parses the given strings as shorts.
        Parameters:
        input - A list of strings to be parsed as shorts.
        defaultValue - The value returned if a string in the list is null.
        Returns:
        A list of shorts representing the given strings.

      • emit

        Serializes the given short as a string.
        Parameters:
        input - The short to be serialized.
        Returns:
        A string representation of the given short.

      • emit

        public static java.lang.String[] emit(short[] input)
        Serializes the given shorts as strings.
        Parameters:
        input - A list of shorts to be serialized.
        Returns:
        A list of string representations of the given shorts.
